author: Special Correspondent
text:
RELIGION

Balathandayudhapani Swamy Temple : Thaipoosa Thiruvizha, Sukravarpet, 10 a.m.

Asthiga Samajam : 12th year Radha Kalyana Mahothsavam and Naama Prachara Vaibhavam, V.R.G Mahal, Edayarpalayam,Thadagam Road, 9 a.m.

Subramanya Swamy Temple : Thaipoosa Thiruvizha-Thiru 'Ther' Vizha and Spiritual Discourse, Marudhamalai, 10 a.m.

GENERAL

The South India Textile Research Association : Diamond jubilee celebrations, SITRA, 10 a.m.

The South India Textile Research Association : Prognosticating 2025-Opportunities and Challenges for the Textile Industry, SITRA, 2 p.m.

CMS Nursery and Primary School : 46th annual day celebration, Coimbatore Malayam Samajam, Gandhipuram, 5.30 p.m.

Anan Kids Academy : The 7th Annual Concert, school premises, Sitra Road, Kalapatti, Near Sharp ITC, 5.30 p.m.

Rathnavel Subramaniam College of Arts and Science : National level seminar on ‘Return to Mythic Literature: Classical to Present’, V.M. Hall, college premises, Sulur, 10 a.m.

Kalaignar Karunanidhi Institute of Technology : Entrepreneurship awareness camp, KIT campus, 9 a.m.

St Thomas English High School : 40th annual day celebration, Gudalur, 4.30 p.m.

Rathinam College of Arts and Science : Tycoon '16 inter-college technical Fest, college auditorium, 10 a.m.

The Coimbatore Small Industries Association : Counselling and guidance to entrepreneurs, CODISSIA Conference Hall, Hozur Road, 3 p.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
